alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:30PM CDT until May 31 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EASTERN MITCHELL...HOWARD AND NORTHERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 930 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Riceville to near Ionia, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Riceville around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cresco and Lime Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
